document_data.name: Quiver
document_data.othernames: Tilya ([[Thieves' cant dictionary#T|Thieves' cant]]){{Cite dragon/409/Talking the Talk|4}}
document_data.mainbody: A '''quiver''' was a container for [[arrow]]s that allowed for quickly drawing them during combat. Besides arrows, some were known to store [[javelin]]s, [[Bolt|quarrels]], and similar missile weaponry within them.
document_data.Description:
Quivers were typically made of leather and had straps on them that allowed it to hang over a user's shoulder.

A typical quiver could hold up to 20 arrows.
document_data.Notable quivers:
* ''[[Bag of Nails (quiver)|Bag of Nails]]'': the enchanted quiver that once belonged to a mad [[tabaxi]] treasure hunter of the [[Bag of Nails|same name]].
* ''[[Quiver of Anariel]]''
* ''[[Quiver of Ehlonna]]''
* ''[[Quiver of plenty]]''
